title: Drawing, "Design for Wall Assemblage", 1980s
medium: Black and color marking pens, crayon on yellow lined paper
inscribed: Inscribed on diagonal, in red marking pen, upper left:  cauthec [?]
description: Square field, tipped to left on page.  On green background, pyramidal form with striped, black, and white sides, protrudes or seems to protrude into space of room.  Black cord dangles from bottom of pyramid form into room.  Small black table in shape of Africa in lower left corner, projects into room and rests on wire leg.  Vertical rectangular sections of yellow, green, and red at lower left and right corners of field.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Wall Assemblage", 1980s.
1980s. Black and color marking pens, crayon on yellow lined paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-308.
